body.name: Lubriderm Fragrance Free Daily Moisture Lotion + Pro-Ceramide, Shea Butter & Glycerin, Face, Hand & Body Lotion for Sensitive Skin, Hydrating Lotion for Healthier-Looking Skin, 24 fl. oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 23 mins
features: 24-fluid ounce bottle of Lubriderm Fragrance Free Daily Moisture Lotion + Pro-Ceramide, Shea Butter and Glycerin to help restore skin's moisture barrier for healthier-looking skin

The lightweight body lotion is formulated with Pro-Ceramide and glycerin to penetrate within skin's surface to help restore skin's moisture barrier. The daily lotion delivers clinically proven 24-hour moisturization for healthier-looking skin
Non-greasy moisturizing lotion with shea butter won't clog pores and it is suitable for the face and body. The hydrating lotion can be used on all skin types, including sensitive skin
The fast-absorbing daily moisture lotion has been allergy- and dermatologist-tested and formulated free of fragrances, parabens, phthalates and dyes

From a brand developed by dermatologists, Lubriderm Daily Moisture Lotion + Pro-Ceramide helps restore skin's moisture barrier. To use, smooth onto face, hands and body daily or as directed by a physician
body.description: Ideal for normal-to-dry skin types, Lubriderm Daily Moisture Fragrance-Free Body Lotion plus Pro-Ceramide, shea butter, and glycerin is our solution to replenish and moisturize dry skin that's suitable for all skin types. From a dermatologist developed brand, this daily moisturizing lotion provides clinically proven 24-hour hydration and helps achieve healthier-looking skin. It is formulated with Pro-Ceramide and glycerin to help restore your skin's moisture barrier. This lotion has a non-greasy, unscented formula that is suitable for the body and face and won't clog your pores. The fast-absorbing formula of this fragrance-free body lotion is suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skin. The allergy- and dermatologist-tested lightweight body lotion is free of parabens, phthalates, and dyes. To use, smooth on face, hands, and body daily or as directed by a physician. Daily Moisture Lotion from Lubriderm, a dermatologist developed brand..

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Compare Our Products Daily Moisture FF Lotion Daily Moisture Lotion Advanced Therapy Lotion Intense Skin Repair Advanced Therapy Wash Daily Moisture Wash Skin Type All Skin Types All Skin Types Itchy, Extra-Dry Skin Rough, Dry Skin Itchy, Dry Skin All Skin Types Key Ingredients Shea Butter and Glycerin Shea Butter and Glycerin Vitamin E and Pro-Vitamin B5 Vitamin E and Minerals Vitamin E and Pro-Vitamin B5 Shea Butter Clinically Proven Hydration 24 Hours 24 Hours 48 Hours 48 Hours When Paired with Lotion When Paired with Lotion Pro-Ceramide Technology ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Suitable for Body + Face ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✘ ✔ Suitable for Sensitive Skin ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Hypoallergenic ✘ ✘ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Allergy Tested ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Fragrance-Free ✔ ✘ ✘ ✔ ✔ ✘ Parabens, Phthalates and Dyes ✘ ✘ ✘ ✘ ✘ ✘

My bottle looks different, did Lubriderm change their packaging? Yes, you may have noticed that we have updated our packaging to showcase our new & improved formula with Pro-Ceramide. This exciting change reflects our commitment to delivering high-quality products. You may receive either design for a short time. Did Lubriderm change their formulas? Yes, Lubriderm has made some exciting changes to enhance our products! We have improved our formulas including the addition of Pro-Ceramide, but don’t worry-our lotions are still fast-absorbing with a clean, non-greasy feel. What is Pro-Ceramide and why is it important? Pro-Ceramide has been shown to penetrate within skin’s surface layers and help support your skin’s natural Ceramide levels. Ceramides play a role in helping maintain a healthy moisture barrier which helps retain moisture within your skin’s surface. Is Lubriderm lotion safe for use on tattoos? Experts recommend using a water-based lotion to hydrate tattooed skin. Lubriderm Daily Moisture Lotion Fragrance Free is a gentle, water-based, unscented lotion that quickly absorbs and moisturizes for healthy-looking skin. Which Lubriderm lotion is best for winter skin? Dry, winter air coupled with heat indoors can lead to very dry skin. Intensely moisturizing products such as Lubriderm Advanced Therapy Moisturizing Cream Fragrance-Free replenish extra dry skin and help to restore your skin's moisture barrier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm delighted to share my experience with the Lubriderm Fragrance-Free Daily Moisture Lotion, which has exceeded my expectations. This lotion has become an indispensable part of my skincare routine for all the right reasons.The carefully crafted formula, enriched with Pro-Ceramide, Shea Butter, and Glycerin, creates a hydration powerhouse. From the first application, I noticed an immediate difference in the texture and feel of my skin. It's not just about surface moisturization; this lotion penetrates deeply, leaving my skin nourished and supple.One standout feature is the fragrance-free aspect. As someone sensitive to scented products, finding a fragrance-free moisturizer is a game-changer. Lubriderm has managed to deliver on this front without compromising on the luxurious feel of the lotion.I've used this lotion on my face, hands, and body, consistently boosting moisture without any greasiness. The lightweight yet potent formula absorbs quickly, making it ideal for morning and evening use. It has become my go-to solution for combating dryness, especially during colder months.Beyond the immediate benefits, I've noticed an improvement in the overall health of my skin. The Pro-Ceramide complex strengthens the skin barrier, resulting in long-lasting hydration and improved resilience against environmental stressors.The packaging is convenient, and the pump dispenser ensures I can easily control my product, preventing wastage.The Lubriderm Fragrance-Free Daily Moisture Lotion has earned a permanent spot in my skincare arsenal. It's more than just a lotion; it's a transformative experience for my skin. If you're searching for a fragrance-free moisturizer that delivers hydration and overall skin health, look no further. Lubriderm has genuinely created a standout product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great unscented everyday lotion
reviews.reviewText: Our family has been using this lotion for years and highly recommend it. The lotion is unscented which is perfect for my wife's sensitive skin. She hastried many different lotions on her face and many of them make her break out in a rash around her eyes but she has never had a problem with this lotion. It's a little bit thicker consistency which is great for dry skin but it also does not leave a greasy residue on your skin. Would highly recommend if your looking for a fragrance free everyday lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth glide, dries oil free
reviews.reviewText: I used this lotion to make a natural bug repellent for a trip I took. It is fragrance free so it took on the scent of the oils that I added to it. It worked really well. Smooth silky consistency. No oily finish

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ive used others but keep coming back to this.
reviews.reviewText: Good lotion for very dry skin, last longer than most. Pleasantly very light fragranced and you get a lot for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Lotion - pricey
reviews.reviewText: I like this lotion - moisturizes very well, gentle on my sensitive skin.My gripe with Lubriderm is that there is always about 1/4 of bottle left that pump doesn’t reach. I have to leave upside down, remove top to get remainder, which is messy.Otherwise fine product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent product, for the entire family!It has NO fragrance, & should be used daily as a moisturizer on your face, year round!I highly recommend it!🥰❗️🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟❗️👍🏻

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly like what you get in store.
reviews.reviewText: Shipped fast and well and I didn’t have to go to the store to buy it. Packaged well with no leaking. Non scented and moisturizing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price, geat lotion.
reviews.reviewText: Used this for 50 years. Love it.
Awesome as always. No strong smell and very light on skin
The media could not be loaded. Non greasy with a mild pleasant smell and hydrating . Been using for a month and not sticky as I’m living in a humid Singapore. Will purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 13, 2017
reviews.reviewText: I first tried this cream in Canada and was obsessed with how amazing it was! However I ran out and it isn't readily available in England sadly. Due to the cold weather my skin became very dry and slightly flakey, so I decided to purchase it from Amazon.. and I'm so happy with how my skin looks! It's so much better of just 2 days of use! I apply the cream about 2 times on my face before I put on my make up. I love this cream and definitely recommend it!!
C'est un produit que j'utilise depuis 1990 lors de mon passage à New-York pour le marathon.Pour les peaux sèches et sur tout le corps. Recommandé dans un drugstore à Manhattan.

reviews.reviewTitle: It’s the best but expensive when bought in india
